game.title: Ancient Mystery
game.objective: Unravel the secrets of the ancient ruins
game.description: Deep within the heart of the forest lies the ancient ruins untouched by man for centuries. It is said to entail an enigma for the chosen one to solve. Could you be the chosen one?

tasks.objective: Obtain the cryptic map from the Old Library
tasks.description: The old library is known to house tomes of ancient civilizations. Seek the cryptic map hidden inside one such book.

tasks.objective: Find and enter the hidden pathway in the forest
tasks.description: Using the cryptic map, hunt down the hidden pathway leading to the heart of the forest, where lies the entrance to the ancient ruins.

tasks.objective: Solve the riddle in the Central Chamber
tasks.description: Inside the ancient ruins, seek the Central Chamber and solve the enigma that has puzzled mankind for centuries.
